tool_description: An API to get information for the game Lost Ark
name: Lost Ark
title: Lost Ark

api_list.name: get stats
api_list.description: Endpoint to get all possible stats
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lost-ark1.p.rapidapi.com/api/stats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lost-ark1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a specific item by id
api_list.description: Enpoint to get a specific item by id

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lost-ark1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

api_list.name: Get all island with dropped items
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the islands with the id's of the dropped items on the island.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lost-ark1.p.rapidapi.com/api/islands"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lost-ark1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
